Job Title: Digital Display Technician

Location: Douglasville, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Design

Description:
DeNyse Companies is hiring a Digital Display Technician! Pay range: $65,000.
Job Summary:Responsible for assembling, programming, and installing custom Electronic Message Centers, LED screens, and programmable LED lights. Understands the signal flow, power consumption, and voltage ratings of all digital products.
Supervisor Responsibilities: N/A
Job Duties & Responsibilities include the following.Verifies scope of work after reviewing work order.Research items and topics for upcoming jobs.Assembles EMCs and/or LEDs for digital sign jobs.Fabricates items for use on EMCs or LEDs.Repairs/maintains EMCs and LEDs as necessary.
Other duties may be assigned as needed.
Required Skills/Abilities:Electrical, fabrication, and IT/networking skillsCommunicationAbility to see how smaller pieces fit into bigger picture.
Education & Experience: Some college or Associate’s Degree required for this position.NovaStar softwareProgramming LEDsBasic hand tools and understanding/reading of blueprints.
1 to 3 years of experience in a related field.15% travel may be required.
Required Licenses/certifications: IT/networking certification

Physical Demands & Working Conditions: The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential function of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. While performing the duties of this Job, the employee is regularly required to stand; use hand to handle, or fee: reach with hands and arms; climb or balance; stoop, kneel, crouch, or crawl and talk or hear. The employee is frequently required to walk. The employee is occasionally required to sit. The employee must regularly lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Frequently lift and or move up to 50 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 100 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus.
Work Environment: The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
The noise level in the work environment is usually noisy.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
